content: st single_crochet in next 7 sts 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 7 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in last 2 sts 25 single_crochet row 7 chain 1 turn single_crochet in same st as chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 9 sts 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 9 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in last 4 sts 33 single_crochet row 8 chain 1 turn single_crochet in same st as chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 10 sts 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 10 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in last 5 sts 37 single_crochet row 9 chain 1 turn single_crochet in same st as chain 1 single_crochet in next 5 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 11 sts 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 11 sts 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in last 6 sts 41 single_crochet row 10 chain 2 slp st in next st 13 x s single_crochet in next 6 sts 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 6 sts slp st in next st chain 2 slp st in next st 13 x s 26 chain 2 loops 15 single_crochet finish off finishing with a piece of the same yarn and a tapestry needle tack center of the body to the strap with a couple of small stitches weave in all ends block if desired to keep wings from curling thread corner of a kitchen towel through the large ring to complete the dress hang on a hook with the small ring optional with ribbon make a small bow and glue just under the head with fabric glue then glue ribbon rose on top of bow midknightstarr webs com midknightstarr wordpress com midknightstarr@gmail com copyright 2006-2014
